channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Please lock and tell me if this is in wrong area.
I have just released my server, and then two so called "hackers" logged onto my server. They ended up somehow turning admin with a gold crown showing, then they kept kicking me on my own server!!! I idmediatly restarted my server, and Ip banned them. One again they log on. They now say that selling admin/mod on my server was against the rules(please post if this is true), so i appologized, for i did not know. They now told me to turn them into and owner, or they would crash my server. I shut my server down, put my firewall up and went to bed.PLEASE POST ON HOW TO FIX THIS, and how did they even do this??
